body_html:
@WenjinTao after I run conda install -c anaconda mkl and then try running conda install pytorch -c pytorch again, I get:

Fetching package metadata .............
Solving package specifications: .


UnsatisfiableError: The following specifications were found to be in conflict:
  - pytorch
Use "conda info <package>" to see the dependencies for each package.

So unfortunately it doesn't seem like that fixes things for me.

body:
@WenjinTao after I run `conda install -c anaconda mkl` and then try running `conda install pytorch -c pytorch` again, I get:
```
Fetching package metadata .............
Solving package specifications: .


UnsatisfiableError: The following specifications were found to be in conflict:
  - pytorch
Use "conda info <package>" to see the dependencies for each package.
```
So unfortunately it doesn't seem like that fixes things for me.
